original_text: Elioenai, Jaakobah, Jeshohaiah, Asaiah, Adiel, Jesimiel, Benaiah 37 and Ziza. Ziza was the son of Shiphi, who was the son of Allon and grandson of Jedaiah. Jedaiah was the son of Shimri and grandson of Shemaiah.
korean_text: 또 엘료에내와 야아고바와 여소하야와 아사야와 아디엘과 여시미엘과 브나야와

sentences.original_text: Elioenai, Jaakobah, Jeshohaiah, Asaiah, Adiel, Jesimiel, Benaiah 37
sentences.korean_translation: 엘리오내, 야아고바, 여소야, 아사야, 아디엘, 여시미엘, 브나야 37명

sentences.original_text: Ziza was the son of Shiphi,
who was the son of Allon
Jedaiah was the son of Shimri
